mapper.select: select r.*, rc.* from review r left outer join review_comments rc on r.w_number = rc.w_number where r.a_number = #{a_number} or r.w_number = rc.w_number

select s.s_name, a.*, ja.*, m.m_nick, ja.m_id as id_rated from job_ads a, shop_info s, job_apply ja, member m where a.m_id = s.m_id and a.m_id = #{m_id} and a.a_status = 3 and a.s_number = s.s_number and a.a_number = ja.a_number and ja.m_id = m.m_id and ja.jar_status not in (7)

select ja.*, a.*, s.*, r.*, m.m_nick, date(r.w_date) as date from job_apply ja, job_ads a, shop_info s, review r, member m where ja.a_number = a.a_number and a.s_number = s.s_number and s.m_id = a.m_id and r.a_number = a.a_number and a.m_id = r.w_writer and s.m_id = r.w_writer and r.w_writer = #{m_id} and m.m_id = ja.m_id and ja.jar_status = 7

select ja.*, a.*, s.*, r.*, m.m_nick, date(r.w_date) as date from job_apply ja, job_ads a, shop_info s, review r, member m where ja.a_number = a.a_number and a.s_number = s.s_number and s.m_id = a.m_id and r.a_number = a.a_number and a.m_id = r.id_rated and s.m_id = r.id_rated and r.id_rated = #{m_id} and m.m_id = r.w_writer and ja.jae_status = 7
